formatted_address: 585 N Bridge Rd, Level 9 Raffles Specialist Centre, Singapore 188770
name: Raffles Neuroscience Centre - 莱佛士脑神经学医疗中心

reviews.text: I have been to so many hospitals but here at neuro centre have to best service I have received. Ms Joyce at front desk is absolutely the best. The way she took care of me was so good. She definitely needs a raise for how she is doing here job. Not forgetting Dr David. He been so tentative.  Listened to my problems and helped me so much.
The doctor is very patient in answering my enquiries. Will recommend Raffles to my friends whom needs to go. Thank you to the counter staff, they were friendly, warm and efficient.

Dr Ramani, a neurosurgeon under this hospital gave a diagnosis to my uncle, that was never his patient to begin with lol! My uncle is a severe stroke patient and is currently NUH, yet he gave a diagnosis of my uncle being able to go home without even physically evaluating or seeing him before.This is extremely shocking to hear, especially with the ethics of being a medical professional. We will follow up and report this unethical doctor to the Singapore Medical Council.
Good service, the staff shared good knowledge and is very helpful.

vicinity: 585 North Bridge Road, Level 9 Raffles Specialist Centre
